trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that defines an action to be executed if the associated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition*> evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions*>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en abstrakt klasse som definerer en handling som skal kjøres hvis den tilknyttede <> </> *> evalueres til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, for <> </> *>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen må arves.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objects (which can be used as both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>objekter (som kan brukes som både <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A>og <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) vanligvis angi en variabelverdi på én av egenskapene for aktiviteten, kaller en metode for aktiviteten eller kalle statiske metoder på typene i refererte samlingene.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: RuleAction is the base type that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> classes derive from.
trans-unit.target: RuleAction er basistypen som <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, og <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>klasser som er avledet fra.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: The uses of these classes is as follows: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av disse klassene er som følger: – en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>endrer en egenskap eller kaller en metode.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: – En <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>fører til at den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>ikke lenger kjøres, og returnerer kontrollen metoden kall.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>eksplisitt angir at en regel oppdaterer en variabel.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør ny evalueringen av berørte regler.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en dyp kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> som er identisk med denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The runtime state that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is executing in.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden tilstand som den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> kjører i.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer feltene og egenskapene oppdatert av en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that was used previously in a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> som ble brukt tidligere i et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that represent the names of fields and properties that are changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En samling av strenger som representerer navnene på feltene og egenskaper som er endret av en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at det <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> er riktig konfigurert, og har ingen feil.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction>inneholder feil (det `Validate` metoden returnerer `false`), deretter <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>inneholder listen over feilene som oppstod.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> til å administrere valideringen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> validated correctly and has no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>skal vises som den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> valideres på riktig måte og har ingen feil; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
